title.narrative: Central Asia Regional Economic Cooperation (CAREC) Corridor 2 Road Investment Program - Tranche 1

description.narrative: Under the CAREC Corridor 2 Road Investment Program, the Project will comprise civil works for rehabilitating about 50 km of the Uzbekistan Section of CAREC Corridor 2 Road (between Km 440 and 490 of A380 highway), support to to the expansion and implementation of the road asset management system, and support capacity building for the Road Fund and the local communities living along the Investment Program road.

participating-org.narrative: Program Management Unit under the Road Fund

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Better connectivity and an efficient transport system along the Uzbekistan section of the CAREC Corridor 2 Road

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
By 2015: Increased average total traffic volume from 1,000 vpd in 2009 to 1,800 vpd

description.narrative: Better connectivity and an efficient transport system along the Uzbekistan section of the CAREC Corridor 2 Road

title.narrative: By 2015: Accident rate on the A380 highway reduced from 150 accidents per year (2008 estimate) to 120

description.narrative: Better connectivity and an efficient transport system along the Uzbekistan section of the CAREC Corridor 2 Road
